title: Aslsh
description: Aslsh is a lightweight shell implemented in Go, made for educational purposes to help me understand basic shell functionality and system command execution.

title: CommanderMTG_API
description: This service provides CRUD operations for managing Magic: The Gathering Commander games, including commanders, matches (partidas), and user-commander relationships.

title: CommanderMTG_Gateway
description: The API Gateway routes requests to either the User Login service for authentication or the CRUD service for managing user data in the database.

title: CommanderMTG_Login
description: This API provides endpoints for user login, registration, and complete CRUD functionality for managing user profiles in the database.

title: Documentacio
description: Benvingut/da a les documentacions personals de Snr1s3. Aquí trobaràs guies i manuals per a la instal·lació i configuració de diferents serveis i eines.

title: notify-telegram-action
description: This GitHub Actions workflow sends a detailed Telegram notification whenever a workflow (such as your tests) finishes running. The notification includes the repository name, commit message, author, workflow name, and the final status (success or failure), helping you easily monitor your project's CI/CD results in real time.

title: PerformanceBot
description: This bot provides real-time monitoring of system resources, including memory, CPU, and disk usage, along with live tracking of Docker container activity. It's designed to offer a clear and responsive overview of system performance for developers and system administrators.

title: Sorting-Algorithms
description: This project provides implementations of various sorting algorithms across multiple programming languages, offering a comprehensive resource for learning, understanding, and comparing different sorting techniques.
